tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE crop_yield_data (
  crop_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  crop_name VARCHAR(255),
  yield_amount DECIMAL,
  year INT,
  region VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE field_data (
  field_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  crop_id INT,
  practice_id INT,
  yield_amount DECIMAL,
  year INT
);

CREATE TABLE Yield_Records (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    crop_id INT,
    field_id INT,
    farmer_id INT,
    practice_id INT,
    yield_value FLOAT
);
